frontmatter.title: His Power to Heal and Forgive
frontmatter.subtitle: Jesus Forgives Sins and Heals a Man Stricken with Palsy
frontmatter.excerpt: Jesus shows that He has power to both forgive sins and heal physical infirmities. Mark 2:1-12

frontmatter.title: Church Announces Plans for New Hymnbook and Children’s Songbook
frontmatter.subtitle: Plans announced for revised Hymnbook, Children’s Songbook
frontmatter.excerpt: Sacred music teaches the doctrines of the gospel, nourishes us spiritually, and has the power to unify Church members throughout the world. The Church has announced it is revising the hymnbook and children’s songbook and invites members to participate.
